channel.title: CVE Feed for Averta -- Phlox Portfolio

item.title: CVE-2023-38399|2024-08-02T17:39:13.475Z -- averta -- phlox%20portfolio
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Averta Phlox Portfolio allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Phlox Portfolio: from n/a through 2.3.1.
